# PAD::SET_CONTROL_LIGHT_EFFECT_COLOR

## Summary
Sets a light device to a constant color (if there is one)

## Parameters
* **CONTROL_TYPE** control
* **INT** red
* **INT** green
* **INT** blue

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
control: see IS_CONTROL_ENABLED
